data.title: BWP to CHF: Convert Botswana Pulas to Swiss Francs
data.meta_description: Use the BWP to CHF currency converter at Exchange-Rates.org for accurate and up-to-date exchange rates. Easily convert Botswana Pulas to Swiss Francs with real-time data.
data.text:
Frequently Asked Question about BWP to CHF

How much is 1 Botswana Pula in Swiss Francs?

1 Botswana Pula = 0.06332 Swiss Francs as of August 29, 2024 01:50 AM UTC. You can get live exchange rates between Botswana Pulas and Swiss Francs using exchange-rates.org, which aggregates real-time forex data from the most authoritative sources.

How much is 100 Botswana Pulas in Swiss Francs?

As of August 29, 2024 01:50 AM UTC, 100 Botswana Pulas is equivalent to 6.3323 Swiss Francs. The exchange rate at this time is 0.06332 Swiss Francs per Botswana Pula.

What was the highest BWP to CHF exchange rate in the last 10 years?

In the last 10 years, the highest rate from Botswana Pulas to Swiss Francs was on January 13, 2015 when each Botswana Pula was worth 0.1069 Swiss Francs.

When is the best time to convert BWP to CHF?

The BWP and CHF can be traded 24x5, starting from the time markets open on Monday mornings in Sydney until they close on Fridays at 5 PM in New York. Exchange rates can fluctuate by the minute while markets are open. However, the period between 3-4 PM GMT is often a good time to convert Botswana Pulas to Swiss Francs because currency market liquidity and trading volume tend to be the highest during this time. Additionally, it's advisable to convert Botswana Pulas to Swiss Francs early in the week if you need CHF urgently. Executing a trade late in the week might result in a delayed settlement until the following week, as forex markets are closed on weekends.

Which is stronger, the Botswana Pula or the Swiss Franc?

The Swiss Franc is currently stronger than the Botswana Pula, as 1 CHF is equal to 15.792 BWP. Conversely, 1 BWP is worth 0.06332 CHF.

Is the Botswana Pula up or down against the Swiss Franc?

The Botswana Pula has increased +1.11% year-to-date against the Swiss Franc. Over the past 10 years, the Botswana Pula has declined -39.48% against the Swiss Franc. Consequently, the Botswana Pula has lost purchasing power compared to the Swiss Franc over the last decade.

What's the best BWP to CHF exchange rate today?

As of August 29, 2024 01:50 AM UTC, the best BWP to CHF exchange rate is 0.06332 CHF. This means that for every Botswana Pula you exchange, you will receive 0.06332 Swiss Francs.
